attributes.action: Reduce costs of utility services during times of isolation
attributes.additional_details: Ask the government to impress and support these families who are in this situation above to reduce the cost of utility costs
attributes.background: The cost of living is increasing for many families on low wages having to stay home. It is also costing workers money working from home keeping their heating and lighting on.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312363

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
